executive_summary.summary: Comprehensive AI discovery analysis for TechRetail Inc. identifying 7 strategic use cases across customer experience, inventory management, and revenue optimization. Total potential annual savings of $8.5M with an average ROI of 95%.

use_cases.title: AI-Powered Customer Service Chatbot
use_cases.description: Intelligent chatbot that handles routine customer inquiries 24/7, reducing support costs while improving response times and customer satisfaction.

use_cases.title: Personalized Product Recommendations
use_cases.description: ML-based recommendation engine that analyzes browsing and purchase history to deliver personalized product suggestions, increasing conversion rates.

use_cases.title: Dynamic Pricing Optimization
use_cases.description: AI system that automatically adjusts prices based on demand, competition, inventory levels, and customer segments to maximize revenue.

use_cases.title: Intelligent Inventory Management
use_cases.description: Predictive inventory system that optimizes stock levels across warehouses and stores based on demand forecasting and seasonal trends.

use_cases.title: Cart Abandonment Recovery
use_cases.description: AI-driven system that identifies at-risk customers and deploys personalized recovery tactics including dynamic discounts and targeted messaging.

use_cases.title: Visual Search and Discovery
use_cases.description: Computer vision-powered search that allows customers to find products by uploading images, improving product discovery and conversion.

use_cases.title: Fraud Detection System
use_cases.description: ML-based fraud detection that analyzes transaction patterns in real-time to prevent fraudulent purchases and chargebacks.
